scripts.copy-json: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const sourceDir = 'src/public/json'; const destDir = 'docs/json'; if (!fs.existsSync(destDir)) fs.mkdirSync(destDir, { recursive: true }); const files = fs.readdirSync(sourceDir); files.forEach(file => { fs.copyFileSync(path.join(sourceDir, file), path.join(destDir, file)); }); console.log('Copied', files.length, 'JSON files to', destDir);"
